hero.title: Fix Data at the Source, Automate at Scale
hero.subtitle: Your finance team spends hours reconciling, validating, and firefighting data errors before reporting. Finance Intelligence from Saras automates anomaly detection, ledger analysis, and inter-company charge allocation (and many more), so that your MIS, compliance, and audits are built on clean, reliable data.

features.title: A Smarter Way to Manage Finance
features.subtitle: Our platform is designed to handle the most demanding financial tasks with ease and accuracy.

items.title: Ledger Analysis & Anomaly Detection
items.description: Automatically scan all ledgers to flag wrong codes, missing narrations, duplicate or suspicious entries, and unsupported transactions before they distort financials.

items.title: Inter-Company Cross Charges
items.description: Eliminate messy reconciliations with rule-based allocations (fixed, percentage, cost-plus) and get consolidated reporting across entities.

items.title: Smart MIS & Reporting
items.description: Generate error-free MIS that is always rooted in clean data, reducing the back-and-forth with auditors and management.

items.title: Real-Time Reconciliation
items.description: Instantly match entries across books, accounts, and periods—no more manual hunting for mismatches.

items.title: Audit-Ready Financials
items.description: By fixing anomalies upfront, you’re always ready with audit-friendly reports that stand scrutiny.

items.title: Agentic Automations
items.description: Our AI-driven financial agents don’t just analyze—they take corrective actions, enforce ledger hygiene, and continuously learn from your patterns.

detailSection.title: Generate Insightful Reports in Minutes, Not Hours
detailSection.description: Break down your financials by cost centers, business units, or product lines with zero manual intervention. Saras makes segmental analysis, revenue attribution, cost distribution, and variance identification an instant and repeatable process, freeing your team to focus on strategy.

cta.title:
Stop Chasing Numbers.
Start Driving Strategy.
cta.subtitle: Saras handles the complex, time-consuming tasks so your team can focus on high-value analysis and strategic decision-making. Turn your raw data into your most powerful asset.
